settings.question: What's your return policy?
settings.answer: For domestic orders, you may return most unworn or unused items within 10 business days of the delivery date for a full refund. Items must be in their original condition with all tags attached.

settings.question: Can I return an item I exchanged?
settings.answer: Yes, exchanged items can be returned following the same return policy. Please note that the return period starts from your original order date, not the exchange date.

settings.question: How can I process a return?
settings.answer: To process a return, please contact our customer service team with your order number. We'll provide you with a return shipping label and instructions on how to send the items back.

settings.question: Where is your jewelry made?
settings.answer: All our jewelry is handcrafted in our workshop using ethically sourced materials. We work with skilled artisans who follow traditional techniques combined with modern design.

settings.question: Are all pieces 14K solid gold?
settings.answer: Yes, all our gold pieces are made from 14K solid gold, not plated. This ensures durability and lasting beauty. Each piece comes with a certificate of authenticity.

settings.question: Do your products have a warranty?
settings.answer: All our products come with a 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects. This covers issues like loose stones, broken clasps, or tarnishing (for applicable materials).

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping times vary by location but typically take 7-14 business days. Customs duties and taxes may apply.

settings.question: How can I track my order?
settings.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can use this number to track your package on our website or the carrier's tracking page.

settings.question: What if my package is lost or damaged?
settings.answer: All our shipments are fully insured. If your package is lost or arrives damaged, please contact us immediately with photos (if damaged) and we'll arrange a replacement or refund.
